Player History
Injured on 8/15/1985 with a Sore Shoulder, out for 1-2 weeks...
Had first career hit on 6/3/1986, off Joe Hesketh (MON)...
Earned first career win on 6/18/1986...
Hit first career homerun on 7/23/1986, off Ricky Horton (STL)...
Won World Series with New York (M) in 1986...
2/2/1988: Gets a new one-year contract worth $5,160,000 through salary arbitration...
2/2/1989: Gets a new one-year contract worth $5,160,000 through salary arbitration...
10/24/1989: Signed a contract extension with New York (M), $2,940,000 per year, for 2 years.
Won World Series with New York (M) in 1989...
Injured on 6/11/1990 with a Bone Chips Shoulder, out for full season...
Traded from New York (M) to Philadelphia on 4/3/1991 (Going to PHI: P Sid Fernandez. Going to NYM: SS Cal Ripken)...
11/1/1991: Signed a contract extension with Philadelphia, $1,570,000 per year, for 2 years.
